name: Ruins of Grimgot
description:
The once grand halls of Grimgot are now over run with goblins. Free the captured dwarves, and clear the ruins of goblins. Some dwarves may even help you.

Move with WASD. Click or R.shift to attack. Switch active dwarf with SPACE. Gather all dwarves at the exit and press ENTER to advance, once each dwarf has been saved and each goblin has been defeated.

Developed with ATTX (https://devattx.itch.io/)

Please note, in WebGL, some UI elements getting stretched. It works fine in full screen.

Developed for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.
